django.contrib.contenttypes.admin
=================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.contenttypes.admin


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.contenttypes.admin.GenericInlineModelAdminChecks
   django.contrib.contenttypes.admin.GenericInlineModelAdmin
   django.contrib.contenttypes.admin.GenericStackedInline
   django.contrib.contenttypes.admin.GenericTabularInline


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: GenericInlineModelAdminChecks

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.admin.checks.InlineModelAdminChecks`


.. py:class:: GenericInlineModelAdmin(parent_model, admin_site)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.admin.options.InlineModelAdmin`


   Options for inline editing of ``model`` instances.

   Provide ``fk_name`` to specify the attribute name of the ``ForeignKey``
   from ``model`` to its parent. This is required if ``model`` has more than
   one ``ForeignKey`` to its parent.


   .. py:attribute:: ct_field
      :value: 'content_type'



   .. py:attribute:: ct_fk_field
      :value: 'object_id'



   .. py:attribute:: formset


   .. py:attribute:: checks_class


   .. py:method:: get_formset(request, obj=None, **kwargs)

      Return a BaseInlineFormSet class for use in admin add/change views.



.. py:class:: GenericStackedInline(parent_model, admin_site)

   Bases: :py:obj:`GenericInlineModelAdmin`


   Options for inline editing of ``model`` instances.

   Provide ``fk_name`` to specify the attribute name of the ``ForeignKey``
   from ``model`` to its parent. This is required if ``model`` has more than
   one ``ForeignKey`` to its parent.


   .. py:attribute:: template
      :value: 'admin/edit_inline/stacked.html'



.. py:class:: GenericTabularInline(parent_model, admin_site)

   Bases: :py:obj:`GenericInlineModelAdmin`


   Options for inline editing of ``model`` instances.

   Provide ``fk_name`` to specify the attribute name of the ``ForeignKey``
   from ``model`` to its parent. This is required if ``model`` has more than
   one ``ForeignKey`` to its parent.


   .. py:attribute:: template
      :value: 'admin/edit_inline/tabular.html'
